sourceMeaningMnemonic: You take a <radical>drum</radical> and a <radical>branch</radical> and... well, what else would you do? You would <kanji>drum</kanji> or <kanji>beat</kanji> them together.
meaningInfo: A branch is just like a drumstick, so of course you're going to drum them together.
readingMnemonic: Who loves to <kanji>drum</kanji> things together and make a huge racket? <ja><reading>子</reading></ja>s (<ja>こ</ja>), of course.
readingInfo: Kids can't get enough of it. Anything that makes a loud drumming noise or anything they can beat together is fun for them.
